title: Iran Students Protest for Second Day Despite State Crackdown
summary_full: Student groups reported protests at universities in Iran’s two largest cities as the government grapples with domestic discontent and the threat of U.S. strikes.
summary_public: Student groups reported protests at universities in Iran’s two largest cities as the government grapples with domestic discontent and the threat of U.S. strikes.

IR.label: positive
IR.evidence: Iran Students Protest for Second Day Despite State Crackdown
